segments.name: Arenal Volcano Extreme Zip-Line Canopy Tour
segments.description:
Ultimate zip-lining experience with the longest and highest lines in Arenal. Multiple extreme routes crossing volcanic landscapes, including:
- 7 consecutive zip-lines
- Highest line reaches 660 feet above the ground
- Total cable length over 1.5 miles
- Challenging routes that will make Tom's Hawaii zip-line look like child's play!

segments.name: Monteverde Cloud Forest Extreme Canopy Adventure
segments.description:
Mind-blowing multi-level canopy tour through the misty cloud forest:
- 12 zip-line routes
- Includes a 'Tarzan Swing' over deep forest canyons
- Suspension bridges with heart-stopping heights
- Advanced routes that test even experienced adventurers
- Stunning views of untouched rainforest ecosystem

segments.name: Osa Peninsula Extreme Rainforest Expedition
segments.description:
Off-the-grid wilderness adventure in one of the most remote national parks in the world:
- Advanced jungle trekking through primary rainforest
- Wildlife encounters with rare species (jaguars, tapirs, scarlet macaws)
- Challenging multi-day hiking routes
- Survival-style expedition with expert guides
- Includes river crossings, extreme terrain navigation
- Completely off the tourist path - true adventure!

segments.notes: Extreme adventure - highest and longest zip-lines in Costa Rica. Multiple lines crossing volcanic terrain. Requires signed waiver and good physical condition.
segments.name: Arenal Extreme Mega Zip-Line Challenge
segments.description: The ULTIMATE zip-line experience featuring the longest and highest lines in Arenal. Multiple extreme lines crossing deep canyons and volcanic landscapes, including a record-breaking 2,400-foot mega-line that will make Tom's Hawaii photos look like a playground ride!

segments.notes: Advanced difficulty. Requires excellent physical fitness, proper hiking gear, and signed liability waiver. Not for the faint of heart!
segments.name: Arenal Volcano Extreme Summit Conquest
segments.description: The most challenging volcano hike in Arenal - a grueling 6-hour trek across volcanic terrain, lava fields, and treacherous landscapes. Technical climbing, steep ascents, and views that will push your limits!

segments.notes: Ultimate adventure package - multiple extreme zip-lines, vertigo-inducing suspension bridges, and challenging forest terrain.
segments.name: Monteverde Cloud Forest Extreme Canopy Expedition
segments.description: The most intense canopy experience in Monteverde - featuring the longest and highest suspension bridges, heart-stopping zip-lines through the cloud forest, and near-vertical descents that will test your courage!

segments.notes: Extreme off-grid adventure. Limited group size. Requires top physical condition, previous adventure experience, and signed extensive waiver.
segments.name: Osa Peninsula Extreme Rainforest Survival Challenge
segments.description: The most remote and challenging adventure in the Osa Peninsula - a full-day extreme expedition combining technical jungle trekking, near-vertical zip-lines through untouched rainforest, and survival skills in one of the most biodiverse regions on the planet!

segments.name: Monteverde Extreme Rainforest Canopy Challenge
segments.description: The ULTIMATE zip-line experience - 15 consecutive ultra-high zip-lines spanning over 2 miles, with drops up to 600 feet and speeds reaching 45 mph. Includes a 'Tarzan Swing' and a near-vertical descent that will make Tom's Hawaii photos look like a kiddie ride!
segments.notes: Extreme adrenaline experience. Highest and longest zip-lines in Central America. Professional guides, full safety equipment provided.
